title: Ticket #1719: Allow StartD ClassAD to contain info from the Windows Registry
description: It would be useful if Windows machines could export bits of information from the registry into the machine's ClassAd. The condor admin should be able to configure which pieces of information to include.
remarks:
2011-Jan-27 14:50:47 by danb:
Bulk change of target version from v070505 to v070506 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Feb-01 16:20:02 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.

2011-Feb-08 15:36:03 by tannenba:
This patch handles the non-performance keys - a new ticket will be opened for the performance keys.
derived_tickets: #2143   StartD ClassAD to contain info from the Windows Performance Registry
check_ins:
2011-Mar-09 16:34   Check-in [25956]: history for #1719. publish windows registry values in StartD's classad (By John Knoeller )
2010-Oct-22 14:10   Check-in [19197]: Initial implementation of #1719 - publish info from the windows registry in StartD ClassAds. A new condor_config value, STARTD_PUBLISH_WINREG, defines a list of registry keys, and optionally the attribute name that each is published as. (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
